description: This file is a server-side entry point for a Remix application. It handles incoming requests, sets relevant response headers, and determines whether the request is from a bot or a browser. It uses server-side rendering via React's stream API to generate HTML responses, with special handling for bot requests to enable SSR and for browser requests to facilitate progressive hydration.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main entry point handling incoming HTTP requests. Sets response headers, handles OPTIONS requests, and delegates the request to bot or browser handlers based on user-agent detection.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests using React's streaming rendering API, returning a streamed HTML response optimized for bots.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, providing a streamed HTML response suitable for client-side hydration.
